0101111110010000 0100001001001110 1 -> sum: 1010000111011111, cout: 0
0011000111110000 1010101001010001 0 -> sum: 1101110001000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
